title: First Protests Begin
description: Marjane witnesses the early demonstrations in Tehran.

title: Islamic Republic Established
description: The Shah is overthrown; the Islamic Republic is born.

title: Iran–Iraq War Starts
description: War breaks out; Marjane’s life is forever changed.

title: Punk Culture Emerges
description: Underground punk scenes spring up in Tehran.

title: Marjane Sent to Austria
description: Marjane leaves Iran for schooling in Vienna.
